content:
The Samsung Galaxy S22 is a powerful device, and there are many excellent video editing apps that are compatible with it. Here are some popular and highly-rated video editing apps that you might consider including in your folder:

1. **Adobe Premiere Rush**: A user-friendly and powerful video editing app from Adobe. It's designed for social media creators and offers advanced features like color grading, audio ducking, and motion graphics. (Free, with in-app purchases)
2. **InShot**: A feature-rich video editor with a wide range of tools, including trimming, splitting, and merging clips. It also offers advanced features like chroma keying, color adjustments, and audio editing. (Free, with in-app purchases)
3. **PowerDirector**: A professional-level video editing app with a wide range of features, including 360-degree video editing, motion tracking, and particle effects. (Free, with in-app purchases)
4. **Filmic Pro**: A high-end video editing app designed for professionals, offering advanced features like color grading, audio ducking, and frame rates up to 240fps. (Subscription-based)
5. **KineMaster**: A powerful video editing app with a user-friendly interface, offering features like chroma keying, color adjustments, and audio editing. (Free, with in-app purchases)
6. **VivaVideo**: A popular video editing app with a wide range of features, including color adjustments, transitions, and audio editing. (Free, with in-app purchases)
7. **Quik**: A fast and easy-to-use video editing app from GoPro, designed for creating quick, social media-ready videos. (Free)
8. **VLLO**: A free video editing app with a wide range of features, including color adjustments, transitions, and audio editing. (Free, with ads)

These apps are all compatible with the Samsung Galaxy S22 and offer a range of features to suit different editing needs and skill levels.

For camera apps, you might consider including:

1. **Open Camera**: A feature-rich camera app with manual controls, HDR, and panorama modes. (Free, open-source)
2. **ProCam X**: A professional-grade camera app with manual controls, RAW image capture, and advanced features like focus peaking and zebra stripes. (Paid)
3. **Camera FV-5**: A manual camera app with features like ISO control, shutter speed control, and focus peaking. (Paid)

Remember to check the system requirements and compatibility for each app before installing. You might also consider including other apps like photo editors, screen recorders, or live streaming apps in your folder, depending on your needs.
